import React,{useState} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "../Form/Form.css" import axios from 'axios' const valor_inicial = { title:"", url:"", imageUrl:"", price:"0" } const Form = () => { const [valor,setvalor]=useState([valor_inicial]) const history= useHistory() function capitura(ev){ const {name,value} = ev.target setvalor({...value,[name]:value}) } function submit(ev){ ev.preventDefault() axios.post('http://localhost:3004/promotions', valor).then((response)=> { history } ) } return(
Volotar para loja

) } export default Form;
